thread.title: Week ahead: China trade - Trump tirade?

title: Week ahead: China trade - Trump tirade?
text:
Week ahead: China trade - Trump tirade? 1:30am IST - 01:55 
Import and export data this week from the world's largest economies will put China back in the spotlight - and along with it, Donald Trump and the threat of protectionism. David Pollard reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Import and export data this week from the world's largest economies will put China back in the spotlight - and along with it, Donald Trump and the threat of protectionism. David Pollard reports.
